bioText1:
After having played in the rock’n’roll band Charly Scooter (1986 à1989) that became Scooter Atomik Band (1989 à 2001), Pierre Dorso relaunched in 2002 Atomik Band III.

Then in 2013, a Rockabilly band : Riding Cats.
bioText2:
Since then the Riding Cats recorded at Sun Studio, Memphis, in july 2017,

was the backup band for Matchbox in september 2017,

was the back up band in 2013 for Sandy Ford from 'Flying Saucer',

for Jeannie Vincent in 2014,

Opened for Aux bonheur des Dames at the festival Rock & Cars,

And were the head lining band of the festival Realcroche 2016.
bioText3: Pierre Dorso founder of the band and ex guitarist of Scooter did open, several times, for INMATES, Charly MC COY, CRAZY CAVAN, Jam piano guitar with Michel Petrucciani (in 1990).
bioRep: Gene Vincent, Jerry Lee Lewis, Eddie Cochran, Stray Cats, Elvis Presley and original songs.
bioPress:
Press

Guitar News : 3 pages article in the April 1993 issue.
bioFormation:
Formation
